tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Real Madrid Vs Barcelona 2-1 [4-4] - All Goals & Match Highlights - August 29 2012 - Supercopa
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: R. Madrid 2-1 FC Barca R. Madrid 4-4 FC Barca On Aggregate R. Madrid Win On Away Goals 08.29.2012 29.08.2012 Gonzalo Higuain Goal 11 Cristiano Ronaldo Goal 19 Lionel Messi Goal 45

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: i have to be honest, but something was wrong with barcelona﻿ that day, you could totally tell, and thats why real madrid won....
you are write . valdes is bad. he was﻿ good keeper 5-6-7-8 years ago
the second goal wasn't﻿ a mistake that was just pure ownage by CR7
allach akbar... nosz﻿ kurwa
what a flick by ronaldo ﻿
What luck did the Real Madrid team have that day. Two rare mistakes by the Barcelona﻿ squad
Valdez had like 10 saves in the game. Messi lost the ball like 20 times. who﻿ was better ?
Is Victor Valdez really that good for Barça?﻿
barcas﻿ defense was bad n dey had 10 players n real madrid only made to goals.garbage.ha.RM tries to play like chelsea but chelsea is way beter than gay madrid haha
كبير﻿ يا رونالدو
Valdez is﻿ crap. Messi, on the other hand, is pure magic. That free kick was beautiful.
how are you a barcelona fan if you didn't know that last time rm﻿ played barcelona they won...
I'M A BARCELONA FAN, BUT WHAT CR7 DID WAS JUST AMAZING !!! IF WE ENJOY FOOTBALL WE CANNOT DENY THAT HE IS﻿ A REALLY GOOD PLAYER, CONGRATS MADRID FANS, VISCA BARCA.
Cristiano's ball flip was a humiliating art for Pique... many﻿ argue this one was a lucky one alongside many others of Ronaldo's, so, to them I say... Bitch, please!
61 people are barca﻿ fans
iniesta -19 messi -17 ronaldo﻿ - 17
u mad bro lool it must suck to be you﻿ cuz we wonn hahahhahahah
Oh now Mascherano and Pique dicide to fuck up,﻿ great. Lol 4-4........... 5-4!
Higuain deserves an upgrade in﻿ fifa 12
yeah if anything you guys are behind...get your trophy game up...yall still catching up.﻿
WTF is wrong with V.VAldes in games﻿ against Madrid? Those should be easy saves for him.

@mspoisonkittymilk hahahaha once u all win a champions league again then all u so called madrid fans can talk shite....champions﻿ league is all that matters nowadays la liga is a joke we all know if barca dont win it then madrid win it by default....how many spanish players play for madrid ???? Exactly its must b frustrating spending a f&cking fortune on players from other countries .and then barely beating a 10man barca squad....its must suck being u guys hahahaha
I'm﻿ so jealous your spelling is so amazing
Ronaldo﻿ embarassed Pique ;O
ok so the present is we took the liga from u﻿ and the super copa and the copa del rey wat else?

Reviewer.Music: Nie mam ulubionej słucham co wpadnie mi w ucho :)
